name: Roulette Shock - Countdown App
description:
Shocking, super-trendy.

Drama & Suspense waiting for you,
Show your Friends & Enjoy your drinking parties!!!

Setup:
Let each friend tap the screen. Once all of your friends have tapped the screen tap on the "start" button, will then randomly select a friend that is tapping the screen.

Countdown Death:

Your countdown is waiting. Based on the horror movie Countdown, this app will predict exactly how long is left.
This application contains vibrations, sounds, music and use of your device torch in order to create the horror experience.
